title: Government announces new education policy
text: The government today announced a new education policy aimed at improving digital learning across rural areas.
subject: politics

title: India launches new weather satellite
text: ISRO successfully launched a new weather monitoring satellite to improve cyclone prediction accuracy.
subject: science

title: Stock markets close higher on economic growth hopes
text: Indian stock markets closed higher today as investors reacted positively to GDP growth data.

title: Health ministry issues advisory on seasonal flu
text: The health ministry released new guidelines to prevent the spread of seasonal influenza.
subject: health

title: Supreme Court delivers verdict on landmark case
text: The Supreme Court today delivered a long-awaited verdict impacting constitutional law.
subject: politics
